reviews.review_msg: Pretty good prof. you will be expected to read a lot to perform well in this course but he makes topics very interesting. He helps answer questions and makes class interesting as well. I would recommend if sociology is something you are interested.

STAY AWAY! Incredibly insensitive, boring, lectures are not engaging whatsoever. She has the personality of a dry wall. No rubrics for any assignments. Incredibly unclear instructions. At times unprofessional. Participation often forced. Students felt obligated to respond cause the prolonged silences was very awkward. Teaching for paycheques only.

Very Knowledgable Proff, highly interested in sociology and politics.  Strengths - ability to protray complex concepts in a very simplified fashion.  Very approachable and fun.  Weaknesses - cannot challenge her EVER... and accent is so damn strong its sometimes hard to understand or not too laugh at times. Overall great!!!

Efe is a very understanding professor and I would definitely take him again. He knows how to engage students and create a productive learning environment. Hes well-prepared and organized. I really like group work, but the only course weakness was that I personally do not like presentations. Best prof ever!

Efe is extremely inconsistent in his teaching methods. He does not follow his syllabus, and has poor communication skills in regards to course materials, and class structure/expectations. At first, I only disliked him as a teacher, but towards the end I started to question him as a person. No teaching ability. I don't think he even wants to teach.
